entries.title: Publications - CBUAE
entries.text: We provide the public with historical Central Bank of the UAE reports and their iterations published previously, as part of our commitment to data transparency.

entries.title: CBUAE | Research and Statistics
entries.text: The Central Bank of the UAE has a dedicated function to gather accurate, insightful and up-to-date data on the UAE's financial and monetary system.

entries.title: Monetary Policy and Domestic Markets - CBUAE
entries.text: The Central Bank of the UAE is mandated to define and implement its monetary policy objectives through the formulation of the Dirham Monetary Framework.
